(iii) Conformance of Audit Test Results to Specifications In-situ concrete tests could not be carried out on the structure since all concrete elements were already overlaid with cement- sand mortar finishes.

(iv) Physical inspection to ascertain presence of defects The auditors inspected works on 5 th September 2018 in the presence of the Engineering Staff from Municipal Engineerâ€™s Office of Gulu. The following were observed:
Recently repaired cracks were observed on the floor running in different directions. However, the repair was poorly done and the cracks are re-surfacing as seen in the following photo.
Cause: Laxity in supervision of works; curing of the screed was poorly done.
Implication: Poorly repaired cracks tend to re-appear which leads to wastage of resources in frequent repairs.
Recommendation: The cracked portion of the floor should be hacked away and re-done.
